revised_title: Researches on the Foraminifera: A Study of Peneroplis and Operculina
tldr: The author examines the morphology and taxonomy of two types of Foraminifera, Peneroplis and Operculina, and discusses their differences in structure and organization. They also describe the wide distribution of Peneroplis in warmer latitudes and the importance of studying these organisms for understanding the range of variation in their species.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Protistology
